overview: Wizard People, Dear Reader, released in 2004, is an unauthorized alternative soundtrack to Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, written by Brad Neely. It is a narrative retelling of the lives of the characters of The Sorcerer's Stone and the world in which they live. Presented in the form of a thirty-five chapter audiobook, the soundtrack replaces the film's audio track.
tagline: An Unauthorized Retelling By Brad Neely
title: Wizard People, Dear Reader
